long_description: The lightweight Novara Express 2.0 bike jacket for women offers waterproof/breathable coverage that stows inside its own zippered rear pocket so it's easy to pack along. Shell's coated nylon fabric is waterproof, breathable and windproof to 60+ mph. Mesh-lined back vent wicks away sweat and lets in fresh air; front zipper offers additional ventilation. Droptail hemline ensures coverage in the riding position. Adjustable cuffs and a stormflap over the front zipper combine to seal out the elements; collar lining is brushed for softness. Waterproof/breathable coverage can be extended by zipping on a Novara Compatible Hood (sold separately). 2 handwarmer pockets; zip rear pocket doubles as a storage pouch for the jacket. The women's Novara Express 2.0 bike jacket has reflective trim that increases visibility in low light.
short_description: The lightweight Novara Express 2.0 bike jacket for women offers waterproof/breathable coverage that stows inside its own zippered rear pocket so it's easy to pack along.
